underConstruction.title: Under Construction
underConstruction.message: Welcome to vTaiwan, currently we are under construction. Please submit feature suggestions and bug reports on GitHub Issues.
underConstruction.messageEn: 歡迎來到 vTaiwan，目前施工中，功能建議與錯誤回報請在Github Issues上提出

mission.title: vTaiwan's Mission
mission.description: vTaiwan is Taiwan's open collaboration platform for public policy, dedicated to promoting dialogue between government and citizens, enabling everyone to participate in the public policy formation process. We believe that through open, collaborative, and co-creative approaches, we can find better solutions for Taiwan's future.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:

auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
auth.loginError: An error occurred during login, please try again later
auth.logoutError: An error occurred during logout, please try again later

footer.description: Open collaboration platform for public policy

home.description: Innovative platform for Taiwan's digital governance

hero.subtitle: vTaiwan is an open collaboration platform that promotes dialogue between government and citizens, enabling everyone to participate in the public policy formation process.

propose.title: Propose Issues
propose.description: Anyone can propose public policy issues worth discussing, which enter the discussion phase after initial review.

discuss.title: Open Discussion
discuss.description: Through online discussions and physical meetings, collect opinions from all parties to form concrete policy recommendations.

policy.title: Policy Formation
policy.description: Transform citizen consensus into concrete policy recommendations and submit them to relevant government departments for reference and implementation.

cta.title: Join us in shaping Taiwan's future together
cta.description: Whether you are a citizen, expert, government official, or anyone concerned about public affairs, you are welcome to join the vTaiwan platform and contribute your ideas.

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.loginRequired: Please login to view and edit your profile

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.joinUsDescription: Whether you are a citizen, expert, government official, or anyone concerned about public affairs, you are welcome to join the vTaiwan platform.

descriptions.projectManager: Responsible for overall project planning and coordination
descriptions.techDirector: Responsible for technical architecture and platform development
descriptions.designer: Responsible for vTaiwan website design and experience curation

transcript.title: Live Transcript
transcript.subtitle: Real-time meeting transcription and proofreading

projects.title: Project List
projects.description: All public policy collaboration projects on the vTaiwan platform. Each project goes through the process of proposal, discussion, consensus building, and policy recommendations.

cta.title: Want to propose a new project?
cta.description: If you have public policy issues worth discussing, you are welcome to propose project suggestions.

projectDetail.discussDesc: Share your ideas and suggestions in the project discussion area and exchange opinions with other participants.
projectDetail.contributeDesc: Provide professional knowledge, research data, or implementation experience to help project development.
projectDetail.shareDesc: Share project information with more friends who care about this issue to expand influence.
projectDetail.joinDesc: Become a core team member of the project and participate in decision-making and execution work.
projectDetail.notFoundDesc: The project you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

meetups.title: Meetups
meetups.description: vTaiwan regularly hosts online and physical meetings to discuss project progress and public policy issues. Everyone is welcome to participate!

upcoming.title: Upcoming Meetups
upcoming.empty: No upcoming meetups at the moment

past.title: Past Meetups
past.empty: No past meetup records at the moment

calendar.title: Meetup Calendar
calendar.description: Subscribe to our meetup calendar to never miss any important meetings.

host.title: Want to host a meetup?
host.description: If you want to host a discussion on a specific project or public policy issue, please contact us.

meetupDetail.notFoundDesc: The meetup you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Join the vTaiwan community and help us promote digital democracy

workingGroup.title: vTaiwan Working Group
workingGroup.description: The vTaiwan Working Group is an important platform for promoting digital democracy. We discuss policies, share ideas, and collaborate on various projects here.

slack.title: g0v Slack Channel
slack.description: Join the g0v Slack workspace and engage in real-time communication with community members in the #vtaiwan channel, participate in discussions and collaborations.
slack.channelDesc: Main discussion channel for policy discussions, project collaborations, and community exchanges

cta.title: Ready to join us?
cta.description: Whether you are a developer, designer, policy expert, or anyone interested in digital democracy, you are welcome to join the vTaiwan community!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.description: Below are common questions and answers about the vTaiwan platform. If you have other questions, please feel free to contact us.

contact.title: Have other questions?
contact.description: If you have other questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact us through the following methods:

propose.title: Propose a Project
propose.description: If you have public policy issues worth discussing, you are welcome to propose project suggestions. Before proposing, please understand the participation requirements.

meeting.title: Participate in vTaiwan Online Meetings
meeting.description: Before proposing, you need to participate in vTaiwan's online meetings to understand the community's operation methods and discussion atmosphere.
meeting.bullet1: Participate in at least one vTaiwan online meeting
meeting.bullet2: Understand the issues and processes discussed in meetings

admin.title: Claim Content Administrator Role
admin.description: Proposals need someone to manage and promote them. You need to claim the role of content administrator for the proposal.
admin.bullet1: Responsible for content management and updates of the proposal
admin.bullet3: Promote the progress and execution of the proposal

step1.title: Participate in Meetings
step1.description: Participate in vTaiwan online meetings to understand community operations

step2.title: Propose Ideas
step2.description: Present your proposal ideas in meetings to gain community support

step3.title: Claim Management
step3.description: Claim the role of content administrator to be responsible for proposal promotion

contact.title: Start Participating
contact.description: Ready to propose your project? Please first participate in our meetings or contact the community.

meeting.title: Join Online Meetings
meeting.description: Join our online meetings to understand how vTaiwan operates and interact with community members.

community.title: Contact Community
community.description: If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact the vTaiwan community through various channels.
